all-origin.title: Allow global hotlinking
all-origin.desc: This allows hotlinking uploads from outside the board. If disabled, hotlinking will be only allowed from inside the board.

max-file-size.title: Max upload size
max-file-size.desc: Maximum size for a file in the uploader. You should make sure this value is equal or lower to what's defined in the web server configuration.

allow-file-edit.title: Allow file editing
allow-file-edit.desc: Allows normal users to edit their own uploads. If disabled, only administrators can perform this action.
